mapper.select: SELECT eno, name, title, cid, num FROM (SELECT eno, name, title, cid, rownum as num FROM (SELECT eno, name, title, cid FROM EMPLOYMENT order by eno desc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT eno, name, title, cid, education, hit, salary, loc, emp_type, content FROM EMPLOYMENT WHERE eno = #{id}

SELECT eno, name, title, cid, num FROM (SELECT eno, name, title, cid, rownum as num FROM (SELECT eno, name, title, cid FROM EMPLOYMENT where eno like '%' || #{id} || '%' or name like '%' || #{id} || '%' or title like '%' || #{id} || '%' or cid like '%' || #{id} || '%' order by eno desc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 15.0) FROM (SELECT eno, name, title, cid FROM EMPLOYMENT where eno like '%' || #{id} || '%' or name like '%' || #{id} || '%' or title like '%' || #{id} || '%' or cid like '%' || #{id} || '%' order by eno desc)
